content: As an AI language model, I can't feel pain (lucky me! ), but generally speaking, threading can be less painful than waxing for some people. With threading, a skilled professional uses a cotton thread to loop and twist around individual hairs, pulling them out from the root. While there may be some discomfort during the process, many people report that threading causes less pain and irritation than waxing. That being said, everyone has their own pain tolerance, and some people may find threading more uncomfortable than waxing. It's always a good idea to communicate with your hair removal professional about your pain tolerance and any concerns you have so they can make the experience as comfortable as possible for you.
